content: all sts now you have 23 sts on your needle purl all on the ws knit all on the rs for the next 26 row and place all sts 23sts on a stitch holder/ wasted yarn dividing the front and back and knit the back side identically assemble the front and back using kitchener stitch video help https //www youtube com/watch v=qwl2ob4anog&t=384s 4 neck line ribbing pick up 4 sts out of 5 sts and make i-cord edging by adding 3 sts from the 1st stitch video help https //www youtube com/watch v=uugac-6rety arm hole ribbing pick up 4 sts out of 5 sts and make i-cord edging by adding 3 sts from the 1st stitch video help https //www youtube com/watch v=uugac-6rety weave in all ends thanks for knitting la brisa top happy knitting i would be so happy if you knit my la brisa top and post some photos on your instagram and tag my account @anakimknitting indigo anakim@gmail com 5
